Well we could still AT LEAST use BM (which I loved) for the name 
Cybertropolis of there capital city.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (I beg to differ.  I'm in a MUSH, that takes place solely on 
Cybertron.  And 
> it is way better than the NBW.  Cybertron would just require lots of 
> thinking.  Like the millions if not billions of civilians that would 
be on 
> the planet, and since all we do in this RPG is fight we'd have to 
take that 
> into account.
> 
> Because most factions in the NBW have, if they're big, 20 
characters, and 20 
> characters would mean jack crap compared to a population of millions 
or 
> billions.)
